With IBM's recent announcement about end of support for WAS v7.0 and v8.0, we want to let you know the capabilities of the newly launched IBM WAS v9.0. This latest version can help you extend your application infrastructure to cloud. Want to learn more about the enhanced features of IBM WAS v9.0? Then here is the right platform for you, where you can get to know about all the details you need for the improvised IBM WAS v9.0.
WAS v7.0 & v8.0 (All Editions)

WebSphere Application Server v9.0
The new IBM WebSphere Application Server v9.0 helps you to create new cloud native applications and APIs, connect existing on-premise applications to the cloud and cloud services, and optimize your entire application infrastructure with intelligent management capabilities. It's that simple and it's available today.

Miracle Software Systems, Inc., is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 22 years of industry experience, Miracle and its team of 2000 employees have been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers to achieve their business goals and reduce costs through the use of technology.
